transArray.content: The service attitude is very good, the room is clean and tidy, recommended

Concise, clear and to the point! Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your review and approval of our service attitude and room hygiene. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable stay. All hotel staff look forward to you I wish you all the best every time you visit! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
